sentences.en: Agave nectar comes from the same plant that tequila is made from.
sentences.cn: 龙舌兰花蜜和龙舌兰酒都是来源于同一种植物.

sentences.en: Agave nectar is one alternative that is used by health conscious consumers.
sentences.cn: 龙舌兰花蜜是具有保健意识的消费者的选择之一.

sentences.en: Bees gather nectar and make it into honey.

sentences.cn: 蜜蜂从花朵上采集花蜜.

sentences.en: Flowers are often fertilized by bees as they gather nectar.
sentences.cn: 花常在蜜蜂采蜜时受粉。

sentences.en: Hummingbirds have discovered that nectar and pollen are very nutritious.
sentences.cn: 蜂鸟发现花蜜和花粉是很有营养的.

sentences.en: Hummingbirds have stiletto - like bills to probe the deepest nectar - bearing flowers.
sentences.cn: 蜂鸟有钻孔锥一样的喙来探进有花蜜花朵的最深处.

sentences.en: Insects are attracted to flowers by their colour, scent and nectar.
sentences.cn: 昆虫为花的色彩 、 香气和花蜜所吸引.

sentences.en: Masture kiwi fruit was chosen as raw material to prepare kiwi nectar.
sentences.cn: 以成熟猕猴桃为主要原料,制成猕猴桃果茶.

sentences.en: Nectar and pollen are very nutritious.
sentences.cn: 花蜜和花粉是很有营养的.

sentences.en: The birds live mainly on nectar.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟主要以花蜜为食。

sentences.en: The nectar and pollen plants are precious wealth to mankind.
sentences.cn: 蜜粉源资源是人类的宝贵财富.

sentences.en: They frequent flowers to collect nectar and pollen to use as food.
sentences.cn: 答案是,它们会穿梭在花丛间,采集花蜜和花粉作为食物.

sentences.en: To comprehend a nectar requires sorest need.
sentences.cn: 要领略仙酒的滋味,须经最痛楚的寻觅.

sentences.en: Tony sipped from his glass. "Mmm. Ambrosia. Nectar of the gods. Divine. Wonderful."
sentences.cn: 托尼从杯中抿了一口感叹道：“哇，人间美味啊，神灵的琼浆玉液呀，天赐之物，太棒了。”

sentences.en: Upon returning to the hive, they deposit the nectar into pockets, called honeycombs, in the hive’s walls. It is from here that we get honey.
sentences.cn: 一返回蜂房，它们便将花蜜储存在被称作“六角形蜂窝”的蜂房壁上的小巢中，我们就是从那里采集蜂蜜的。

words.tran_cn: [植]花蜜；甘露；神酒；任何美味的饮料

trans.tran_cn: 花蜜，（古希腊、罗马神话中的）众神饮的酒，琼浆玉液，甘美的饮料
trans.tran_en: the sweet liquid that bees collect from flowers
